language_description: Select the language you want to use
goal_overlay_body: You have achieved your daily learning goal!
translator_engine_description: Select the translator API you want to use
settings_backup_failed_message: Could not create backup file. Please try again.
settings_backup_completed_message: Your data has been backed up successfully.
settings_restore_completed_message: Your data has been restored successfully.
settings_restore_failed_message: Could not restore from the selected file.
reset_user_data_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to reset your entire user data & statistics?
reset_user_data_success: User data & statistics have been reset successfully.
reset_vocabulary_stats_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to reset your entire vocabulary statistics?
reset_vocabulary_stats_success: User vocabulary statistics have been reset successfully.
reset_remove_vocabulary_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to REMOVE your entire VOCABULARY (all words & categories)?
reset_remove_vocabulary_success: User vocabulary (words & categories) has been removed successfully.
faq_personal_dashboard_body: See your streak, daily goal, overall progress, and a motivational quote on the profile screen so you always know how you are doing.
faq_daily_learning_body: Get a fresh set of words to learn and review every day on the Learn tab, and practice more with quick review, word‑pairs, and build‑the‑word training modes.
faq_vocabulary_body: Create your own categories with icons, add new words at any time, and manage a personal dictionary that tracks your learning progress.
faq_translation_body: Translate words English ↔ Russian, keep a searchable history of your lookups, clear it when you want, and save useful translations straight into your vocabulary with a chosen category.
faq_backup_body: From Settings you can export all your data (goals, vocabulary, categories, and translations) to a backup file and restore it later if you switch or reset devices.
faq_theme_body: Switch between light and dark themes, reset statistics, or reset vocabulary progress from the Settings dialog when you want a fresh start.
practice_mode_description: Choose the practice mode you want to use
practice_pick_english_description: Pick the correct English translation of the word from the given options
practice_audio_description: Listen to the English word and pick the correct Russian translation
practice_overview_description: Review your vocabulary words one by one and mark the ones you know
practice_pairs_description: Match each Russian word with its English translation
practice_builder_description: Build the English word by picking letters in the correct order
practice_limit_description: Choose a practice limit for each practice session (1 session = 1 set of words)
practice_pick_english_end_message: You made {{mistakes}} mistakes while picking the correct English translation
practice_audio_end_message: You made {{mistakes}} mistakes while picking the correct Russian translation
practice_pairs_end_message: You made {{mistakes}} mistakes while solving {{total}} pairs
vocabulary_index_categories_description: Manage your categories! Create, edit, remove!
vocabulary_index_words_description: Manage your words! Create, edit, remove!
vocabulary_index_translation_description: Translate words freely between English and Russian!
vocabulary_delete_category_confirm_messa: Are you sure you want to delete this category?
vocabulary_category_picker_description: Choose a category to assign. You can change it later.
vocabulary_edit_word_subtitle: Tap a field to quickly update any part of the word.
vocabulary_delete_word_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to delete this word?
vocabulary_create_word_subtitle: Fill in the details of your new vocabulary item.
vocabulary_create_category_subtitle: Group your words with a name and emoji for quick scanning.
vocabulary_save_translation_subtitle: Choose a category for this translation and save it to your vocabulary.
translation_clear_history_confirm_messag: Are you sure you want to clear your translation history?
translation_clear_history_success: Translation history has been cleared successfully.
